## Rochester Zones

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(plotly)
library(rjson)
library(sf)
library(colorspace)
library(scales)
library(ggmap)


```

## Trees

```{r}
#| label: trees

roc_trees <- read_csv('data/roc_trees.csv')

trees <- roc_trees |>
  group_by(STREET_NAME) |>
  summarize(tree_count = n())

trees |>
  arrange(-tree_count) |>
  head()

```

## Taxes

```{r}
#| label: taxes

roc_taxes <- read_csv('data/roc_tax_parcel.csv')

taxes <- roc_taxes |>
  group_by(STREET_NAME) |>
  summarise(properties = n(),
            avg_area = mean(STATEDAREA),
            med_area = median(STATEDAREA),
            avg_val = mean(CURRENT_TOTAL_VALUE),
            med_val = median(CURRENT_TOTAL_VALUE))

taxes |>
  arrange(-med_val)
```
